Verwendungen von Schnittstelle
org.com.model.domain.statistics.StatisticStrategy

Packages, die StatisticStrategy verwenden
Package
Beschreibung
org.com.model.domain.statistics
 

  • Verwendungen von StatisticStrategy in org.com.model.domain.statistics

    Klassen in org.com.model.domain.statistics, die StatisticStrategy implementieren
    Modifizierer und Typ
    Klasse
    Beschreibung
    class 
    ActorRatingsStrategy
    A strategy for calculating the average ratings for each actor based on the cinematics.
    class 
    GenreCountStrategy
    A strategy for calculating the count of each genre in the list of cinematics.
    class 
    GenreRatingsStrategy
    A strategy for calculating the average ratings (both personal and IMDb) for each genre.
    class 
    ImdbRatingAverageStrategy
    A strategy for calculating the average IMDb ratings for a given list of cinematics.
    class 
    MyRatingAverageStrategy
    A strategy for calculating the average of the user's ratings for a given list of cinematics.
    class 
    PercentageRatingDifferenceStrategy
    A strategy for calculating the percentage difference between the user's average rating and IMDb's average rating for a given list of cinematics.
    class 
    StateCountStrategy
    A strategy for calculating the count of cinematics in different states (e.g., Finished, Dropped, Watching, ToWatch) based on filtering criteria.
    class 
    TypeCountStrategy
    A strategy for calculating the count of cinematics by their type (Movie, Series, Anime).
